participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily finds joy in simple pleasures and values her close-knit community.
participant_1.background: i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.
